column1: Visitation for Ida Rode will be Monday June 22
column2: 2015 from 5:00p.m. to 7:00p.m. in the Fredericksburg Funeral Home and from 9:00 a.m. to 10:00a.m. Tuesday in St James Lutheran Church in Harper.   Services for Ida Rode will be on Tuesday June 23
column3: 2015 in the St James Lutheran Church in Harper at 10:00 a.m. with Pastor Scott Hofmann officiating. Interment will follow in the Harper Community Cemetery.
